4300210.name: Masackra
4300210.description:
This is a turn-based tactics game where you control a squad of soldiers on a grid-based battlefield and build a strategy around classes, factions, and their synergies.

Each battle isn't just an exchange of blows, but a test of your decisions: who to buff, what bonuses to collect, who to sacrifice.

âš”ï¸ Tactical Battles

- Turn-based battles on a grid-based map

- Positioning, abilities, resource control

- Victory depends on team composition and class interaction

ğŸ§© Classes and Synergies

- Each class impacts the battle in its own way

- Team bonuses are enhanced when matching classes

- Powerful combinations, but there's no single right answer

ğŸŒ Events and Progression

- Between battles, you can participate in events that strengthen your squad or provide resources

- Buffs for individual fighters and the entire team

- Decisions accumulate and are felt in subsequent battles

ğŸ” Replayability

- Random map and event generation

- Different squad builds â†’ different playstyles

- Each run is unique
